name: Timeless Memories
description:
Will you be able to escape from your timeless memories?

Timeless Memories is a short interactive story about life, death and something that is not love (but some people would think that it is).

Music by Vadim Kiselev.

------ CONTROLS ------

  • Move: WASD or Arrows.
  • Interact: E or Enter.
  • Exit game (for Win, Linux and Mac platforms): Alt+F4

------ KEY FEATURES ------

  • Micro-story: you can finish the game in less than 5 minutes.
  • Social-issue game.
  • Oppresive atmosphere.
  • Localized to Spanish and English.

------ CHANGELOG ------

Version 2

  • Some bugs fixed

Version 1

  • Original Ludum Dare version
